command: CONFIG_FILE=".claude/ll-config.json"; if [ ! -f "$CONFIG_FILE" ]; then CONFIG_FILE="ll-config.json"; fi; if [ -f "$CONFIG_FILE" ]; then echo "[little-loops] Config loaded: $CONFIG_FILE"; cat "$CONFIG_FILE" | head -50; else echo "[little-loops] Warning: No config found. Run /ll:init to create one."; fi
if [ ! -f ".claude/ll-config.json" ] && [ ! -f "ll-config.json" ]; then echo '[little-loops] No config found. Run /ll:init to set up little-loops for this project.'; fi

rm -f .claude/.ll-lock 2>/dev/null; if [ -d .worktrees ] && command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1; then git worktree list 2>/dev/null | grep '.worktrees' | awk '{print $1}' | while read w; do git worktree remove --force "$w" 2>/dev/null || true; done; fi; echo '[little-loops] Session cleanup complete'
